channel.title: Kris Wu's Humble Site
channel.description: Recent content on Kris Wu's Humble Site

item.title: Hi, I'm Kris Wu
item.description: the Marathoner I have spent almost half of my life away from my family. Having studied in China, Singapore, Europe, the US, I do have acquired a global awareness. My proudest achievements are not academics, internships, or photographs taken. It is my jogging journey. I did my first ultra-marathon (50km) at age 20. I consider this the best gift bestowed upon self. Over the years, I did travel and ran a lot.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
